subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, who led by 30 at one point in the fourth quarter, backed the owner’s vote of confidence for Coach Isiah Thomas with a thumping of the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night.
snippet: The Knicks, who led by 30 at one point in the fourth quarter, backed the owner’s vote of confidence for Coach Isiah Thomas with a thumping of the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night.
